title: Clay Travis and Buck Sexton Show H2 – Apr 21 2022
itunes:title: Clay Travis and Buck Sexton Show H2 – Apr 21 2022
description:
Blue Check Brigade goes into virtue signaling overdrive over lifting of mask mandate. ABCNews: Air on board an airplane while it's in flight is actually as clean as a hospital room. Glaring red flag: Asked about ending Title 42, bumbling Biden instead answers about mandating masks on airplanes. Florida House passes bill stripping Disney of self-governing status, congressional redistricting plan that creates four Republican House seats. Governor DeSantis shows Republicans how to win. Will the GOP listen?

Follow Clay & Buck on YouTube: https://www.youtube.com/c/clayandbuck

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
